affirmations.body: I admire and respect my partner.
I am manifesting my dream partner.
I enjoy the time I spend with my spouse and we have fun together.
I have loving relationship with my spouse.
I love my partner exactly as they are, enjoying their unique qualities.
I share emotional intimacy with my partner.
I want the best for my spouse and go out of my way to support them in their personal and professional life.
I only attract healthy, loving relationships.
My partner shows me deep, passionate love.
